title: 2025 German federal election - Wikipedia
snippet: Following a government crisis, Olaf Scholz dismissed FDP leader Christian Lindner from the incumbent government on 6 November 2024, triggering the collapse of the traffic light coalition and leaving the government without a majority. On the same day, Chancellor Scholz announced he would submit ...

title: Chancellor of Germany - Wikipedia
snippet: The current officeholder is Friedrich Merz of the Christian Democratic Union, sworn in on 6 May 2025. The office of chancellor has a long history, stemming back to the Holy Roman Empire (c. 900–1806). The title of chancellor (Latin: cancellarius) was given to the head of the clerics at the ...

title: Germany's new chancellor: Who is Friedrich Merz? – DW – 05/06/2025
snippet: But as the would-be head of government, Merz hopes to lead a coalition between the CDU and these parties, and mediate between their interests. title: Meet Germany's new government – DW – 05/06/2025
snippet: Germany's new government is in place. Cabinet ministers include loyal allies of CDU Chancellor Friedrich Merz and SPD leader Lars Klingbeil. However, some of the appointments are surprising.

title: Who is Friedrich Merz, Germany's likely next chancellor? – DW – 04/09/2025
